actions.text: Clean Bill H.R.6007 Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee in Lieu.

official_title: A bill to modify the procedures regarding judicial service of retired judges of District of Columbia courts, and for other purposes.
short_title: District of Columbia Judicial Retirement Reform Act of 1984

summary.text: District of Columiba Judicial Retirement Reform Act of 1984 - Amends the District of Columbia Code to provide that a retired judge who has been designated a senior judge may be appointed by the chief judge to perform such judicial duties as such senior judge is willing and able to undertake. Sets forth the procedure for designating a retired judge as a senior judge by the District of Columbia Commission on Judicial Disabilities and Tenure. Provides for retirement benefits for the executive officer of the District of Columbia Courts.

titles.title: District of Columbia Judicial Retirement Reform Act of 1984
A bill to modify the procedures regarding judicial service of retired judges of District of Columbia courts, and for other purposes.
